blocks.name: deranglem
blocks.content: Lemma for derangements. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm deranglem(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(cab(s0, wa(wf1o(cv(s0), c0, c0), w0)), cfn))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  anidms(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(cab(s0, wa(wf1o(cv(s0), c0, c0), w0)), cfn))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c0, cfn)), wcel(cab(s0, wa(wf1o(cv(s0), c0, c0), w0)), cfn), wcel(co(c0, cmap, c0), cfn), wss(cab(s0, wa(wf1o(cv(s0), c0, c0), w0)), co(c0, cmap, c0)))
  mapfi(c0, c0)
  abssdv(s0, co(c0, cmap, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c0, cfn)), wa(wf1o(cv(s0), c0, c0), w0))
  syl5ibr(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c0, cfn)), wa(wf1o(cv(s0), c0, c0), w0), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cmap, c0)), wf(cv(s0), c0, c0))
  adantr(wf1o(cv(s0), c0, c0), w0, wf(cv(s0), c0, c0))
  f1of(cv(s0), c0, c0)
  elmapg(c0, cfn, c0, cfn, cv(s0))
  ssfi(co(c0, cmap, c0), cab(s0, wa(wf1o(cv(s0), c0, c0), w0)))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cmap, c0)
  diff.cmap.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c0, cfn))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfn)
  diff.cfn.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm deranglem(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Fin → { s0 |((s0 : c0 ↔ c0)∧ w0)} ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  anidms(c0 ∈ Fin, { s0 |((s0 : c0 ↔ c0)∧ w0)} ∈ Fin)
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c0 ∈ Fin), { s0 |((s0 : c0 ↔ c0)∧ w0)} ∈ Fin, (c0[↦]c0)∈ Fin, { s0 |((s0 : c0 ↔ c0)∧ w0)} ⊆(c0[↦]c0))
  mapfi(c0, c0)
  abssdv(s0, (c0[↦]c0), (c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c0 ∈ Fin), ((s0 : c0 ↔ c0)∧ w0))
  syl5ibr((c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c0 ∈ Fin), ((s0 : c0 ↔ c0)∧ w0), s0 ∈(c0[↦]c0), (s0 : c0 → c0))
  adantr((s0 : c0 ↔ c0), w0, (s0 : c0 → c0))
  f1of(s0, c0, c0)
  elmapg(c0, cfn, c0, cfn, s0)
  ssfi((c0[↦]c0), { s0 |((s0 : c0 ↔ c0)∧ w0)})
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cmap, c0)
  diff.cmap.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ Fin, c0 ∈ Fin)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfn)
  diff.cfn.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: derangval
blocks.content: Define the derangement function, which counts the number of bijections from a set to itself such that no element is mapped to itself. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm derangval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(chash, cab(s0, wa(wf1o(cv(s0), c0, c0), wral(s1, c0, wne(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s2, cfn, cfv(chash, cab(s0, wa(wf1o(cv(s0), cv(s2), cv(s2)), wral(s1, cv(s2), wne(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(chash, cab(s0, wa(wf1o(cv(s0), c0, c0), wral(s1, c0, wne(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))))))), diffss(s0, s1))
  fvmpt(s2, c0, cfn, c1, cfv(chash, cab(s0, wa(wf1o(cv(s0), c0, c0), wral(s1, c0, wne(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))))), cfv(chash, cab(s0, wa(wf1o(cv(s0), cv(s2), cv(s2)), wral(s1, cv(s2), wne(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))))))
  fveq2d(chash, cab(s0, wa(wf1o(cv(s0), cv(s2), cv(s2)), wral(s1, cv(s2), wne(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))), cab(s0, wa(wf1o(cv(s0), c0, c0), wral(s1, c0, wne(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(s2), c0))
  abbidv(s0, wceq(cv(s2), c0), wa(wf1o(cv(s0), cv(s2), cv(s2)), wral(s1, cv(s2), wne(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wa(wf1o(cv(s0), c0, c0), wral(s1, c0, wne(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s2), c0), wf1o(cv(s0), cv(s2), cv(s2)), wral(s1, cv(s2), wne(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))), wf1o(cv(s0), c0, c0), wral(s1, c0, wne(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))
  bitrd(wceq(cv(s2), c0), wf1o(cv(s0), cv(s2), cv(s2)), wf1o(cv(s0), c0, c0), wf1o(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))
  f1oeq2(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0), cv(s2))
  f1oeq3(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0), c0)
  raleq(s1, cv(s2), c0, wne(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))
  fvex(chash, cab(s0, wa(wf1o(cv(s0), c0, c0), wral(s1, c0, wne(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))))
  diff.cfn.s(s2)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, chash, cab(s0, wa(wf1o(cv(s0), c0, c0), wral(s1, c0, wne(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))))
  diff.chash.s(s2)
  diff.cab.s(s2, s0, wa(wf1o(cv(s0), c0, c0), wral(s1, c0, wne(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))))
  diff.wa.s(s2, wf1o(cv(s0), c0, c0), wral(s1, c0, wne(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))
  diff.wf1o.s(s2, cv(s0), c0, c0)
  diff.wral.s(s2, s1, c0, wne(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))
  diff.wne.s(s2, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s2), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: derangf
blocks.content: The derangement number is a function from finite sets to nonnegative integers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm derangf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wf(c0, cfn, cn0)
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cfn, cfv(chash, cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
} = {
  a1ii(wf(c0, cfn, cn0), diffss(s0, s2))
  a1ii(wf(c0, cfn, cn0), diffss(s1, s2))
  fmpti(s0, c0, cfn, cn0, cfv(chash, cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2)))))))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), cfn), wcel(cfv(chash, cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2)))))), cn0), wcel(cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))), cfn))
  deranglem(s1, cv(s0), wral(s2, cv(s0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))
  hashcl(cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))))
  diff.cfn.s(s0)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm derangf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 : Fin → ℕ0)
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ Fin ↦(# ` { s1 |((s1 : s0 ↔ s0)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ s0,(s1 ` s2)≠ s2))}))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 : Fin → ℕ0), d(s0, s2))
  a1ii((c0 : Fin → ℕ0), d(s1, s2))
  fmpti(s0, c0, cfn, cn0, (# ` { s1 |((s1 : s0 ↔ s0)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ s0,(s1 ` s2)≠ s2))}))
  syl(s0 ∈ Fin, (# ` { s1 |((s1 : s0 ↔ s0)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ s0,(s1 ` s2)≠ s2))})∈ ℕ0, { s1 |((s1 : s0 ↔ s0)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ s0,(s1 ` s2)≠ s2))} ∈ Fin)
  deranglem(s1, s0, ∀(s2 ∈ s0,(s1 ` s2)≠ s2))
  hashcl({ s1 |((s1 : s0 ↔ s0)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ s0,(s1 ` s2)≠ s2))})
  diff.cfn.s(s0)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: derang0
blocks.content: The derangement number of the empty set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm derang0(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wceq(cfv(c0, emptycls), nat1)
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cfn, cfv(chash, cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
} = {
  3eqtri(cfv(c0, emptycls), nat1, cfv(chash, cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), emptycls, emptycls), wral(s2, emptycls, wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2)))))), cfv(chash, csn(emptycls)))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(c0, emptycls), cfv(chash, cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), emptycls, emptycls), wral(s2, emptycls, wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))))), wcel(emptycls, cfn))
  0fin()
  derangval(s1, s2, s0, emptycls, c0)
  fveq2i(chash, cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), emptycls, emptycls), wral(s2, emptycls, wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))), csn(emptycls))
  eqtr4i(cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), emptycls, emptycls), wral(s2, emptycls, wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))), csn(emptycls), cab(s1, wceq(cv(s1), emptycls)))
  abbii(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), emptycls, emptycls), wral(s2, emptycls, wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s1), emptycls))
  bitr3i(wa(wf1o(cv(s1), emptycls, emptycls), wral(s2, emptycls, wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s1), emptycls), wf1o(cv(s1), emptycls, emptycls))
  biantru(wf1o(cv(s1), emptycls, emptycls), wral(s2, emptycls, wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))
  ral0(s2, wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2)))
  mpbiran2(wf1o(cv(s1), emptycls, emptycls), wceq(cv(s1), emptycls), wceq(emptycls, emptycls))
  eqid(emptycls)
  f1o00(cv(s1), emptycls)
  df-sn(s1, emptycls)
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(chash, csn(emptycls)), nat1), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  0ex()
  hashsng(emptycls, universe)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
  diff.emptycls.s(s2)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm derang0(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ` ∅)= 1
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ Fin ↦(# ` { s1 |((s1 : s0 ↔ s0)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ s0,(s1 ` s2)≠ s2))}))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
} = {
  3eqtri((c0 ` ∅), nat1, (# ` { s1 |((s1 : ∅ ↔ ∅)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ ∅,(s1 ` s2)≠ s2))}), (# ` { ∅ }))
  ax-mp((c0 ` ∅)=(# ` { s1 |((s1 : ∅ ↔ ∅)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ ∅,(s1 ` s2)≠ s2))}), ∅ ∈ Fin)
  0fin()
  derangval(s1, s2, s0, emptycls, c0)
  fveq2i(chash, { s1 |((s1 : ∅ ↔ ∅)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ ∅,(s1 ` s2)≠ s2))}, { ∅ })
  eqtr4i({ s1 |((s1 : ∅ ↔ ∅)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ ∅,(s1 ` s2)≠ s2))}, { ∅ }, { s1 | s1 = ∅ })
  abbii(s1, ((s1 : ∅ ↔ ∅)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ ∅,(s1 ` s2)≠ s2)), s1 = ∅)
  bitr3i(((s1 : ∅ ↔ ∅)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ ∅,(s1 ` s2)≠ s2)), s1 = ∅, (s1 : ∅ ↔ ∅))
  biantru((s1 : ∅ ↔ ∅), ∀(s2 ∈ ∅,(s1 ` s2)≠ s2))
  ral0(s2, (s1 ` s2)≠ s2)
  mpbiran2((s1 : ∅ ↔ ∅), s1 = ∅, ∅ = ∅)
  eqid(emptycls)
  f1o00(s1, emptycls)
  df-sn(s1, emptycls)
  ax-mp((# ` { ∅ })= 1, ∅ ∈ 𝕌)
  0ex()
  hashsng(emptycls, universe)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
  diff.emptycls.s(s2)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: derangsn
blocks.content: The derangement number of a singleton. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm derangsn(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, csn(c0)), nat0))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, cfn, cfv(chash, cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  syl6eq(cfv(c2, csn(c0)), nat0, cfv(chash, emptycls), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl5eq(cfv(c2, csn(c0)), cfv(chash, emptycls), cfv(chash, cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), csn(c0), csn(c0)), wral(s2, csn(c0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2)))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(c2, csn(c0)), cfv(chash, cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), csn(c0), csn(c0)), wral(s2, csn(c0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))))), wcel(csn(c0), cfn))
  snfi(c0)
  derangval(s1, s2, s0, csn(c0), c2)
  fveq2d(chash, cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), csn(c0), csn(c0)), wral(s2, csn(c0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))), emptycls, wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), csn(c0), csn(c0)), wral(s2, csn(c0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))), emptycls), wss(cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), csn(c0), csn(c0)), wral(s2, csn(c0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))), emptycls))
  abssdv(s1, emptycls, wcel(c0, c1), wa(wf1o(cv(s1), csn(c0), csn(c0)), wral(s2, csn(c0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2)))))
  ex(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wf1o(cv(s1), csn(c0), csn(c0)), wral(s2, csn(c0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s1), emptycls))
  pm2.21dd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wf1o(cv(s1), csn(c0), csn(c0)), wral(s2, csn(c0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))), wcel(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cfv(cv(s1), c0), csn(c0)))
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wf1o(cv(s1), csn(c0), csn(c0)), wral(s2, csn(c0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2)))), wcel(cfv(cv(s1), c0), csn(c0)), wf(cv(s1), csn(c0), csn(c0)), wcel(c0, csn(c0)))
  adantr(wf1o(cv(s1), csn(c0), csn(c0)), wral(s2, csn(c0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))), wf(cv(s1), csn(c0), csn(c0)))
  f1of(cv(s1), csn(c0), csn(c0))
  ffvelrn(cv(s1), csn(c0), csn(c0), c0)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wf1o(cv(s1), csn(c0), csn(c0)), wral(s2, csn(c0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))), wn(wcel(cfv(cv(s1), c0), csn(c0))), wne(cfv(cv(s1), c0), c0))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wf1o(cv(s1), csn(c0), csn(c0)), wral(s2, csn(c0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2)))), wne(cfv(cv(s1), c0), c0), wcel(c0, csn(c0)), wral(s2, csn(c0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))
  snidg(c0, c1)
  simpr(wf1o(cv(s1), csn(c0), csn(c0)), wral(s2, csn(c0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))
  rspcva(s2, c0, csn(c0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2)), wne(cfv(cv(s1), c0), c0))
  neeq12d(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2), cfv(cv(s1), c0), c0, wceq(cv(s2), c0))
  fveq2(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1))
  id(wceq(cv(s2), c0))
  nelsn(cfv(cv(s1), c0), c0)
  ss0(cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), csn(c0), csn(c0)), wral(s2, csn(c0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))))
  hash0()
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.csn.s(s1, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s2, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wne.s(s2, cfv(cv(s1), c0), c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cv(s1), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: derangenlem
blocks.content: One half of ~ derangen . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm derangenlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), cle, cfv(c2, c1)))

blocks.name: derangen
blocks.content: The derangement number is a cardinal invariant, i.e. it only depends on the size of a set and not on its contents. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm derangen(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, cfn, cfv(chash, cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  mpbir2and(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2, c1)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), cle, cfv(c2, c1)), wbr(cfv(c2, c1), cle, cfv(c2, c0)))
  derangenlem(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2)
  syl2anc(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wbr(cfv(c2, c1), cle, cfv(c2, c0)), wbr(c1, cen, c0), wcel(c0, cfn))
  adantr(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn), wbr(c1, cen, c0))
  ensym(c0, c1)
  derangenlem(s0, s1, s2, c1, c0, c2)
  syl2anc(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wb(wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2, c1)), wa(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), cle, cfv(c2, c1)), wbr(cfv(c2, c1), cle, cfv(c2, c0)))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cn0), wcel(cfv(c2, c1), cn0))
  syl(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn)), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cn0), wcel(c0, cfn))
  biimpar(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c0, cfn))
  enfi(c0, c1)
  ffvelrni(c0, cfn, c2, cn0)
  adantl(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(cfv(c2, c1), cn0))
  ffvelrni(c1, cfn, c2, cn0)
  derangf(s0, s1, s2, c2)
  syl2an(wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cn0), wcel(cfv(c2, c1), cn0), wb(wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2, c1)), wa(wbr(cfv(c2, c0), cle, cfv(c2, c1)), wbr(cfv(c2, c1), cle, cfv(c2, c0)))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cr), wcel(cfv(c2, c1), cr))
  nn0re(cfv(c2, c0))
  nn0re(cfv(c2, c1))
  letri3(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm derangen(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)→(c2 ` c0)=(c2 ` c1))
  ⊣ c2 =(s0 ∈ Fin ↦(# ` { s1 |((s1 : s0 ↔ s0)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ s0,(s1 ` s2)≠ s2))}))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  mpbir2and((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin), (c2 ` c0)=(c2 ` c1), (c2 ` c0)[≤](c2 ` c1), (c2 ` c1)[≤](c2 ` c0))
  derangenlem(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2)
  syl2anc((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin), (c2 ` c1)[≤](c2 ` c0), c1[≅]c0, c0 ∈ Fin)
  adantr(c0[≅]c1, c1 ∈ Fin, c1[≅]c0)
  ensym(c0, c1)
  derangenlem(s0, s1, s2, c1, c0, c2)
  syl2anc((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin), ((c2 ` c0)=(c2 ` c1)↔((c2 ` c0)[≤](c2 ` c1)∧(c2 ` c1)[≤](c2 ` c0))), (c2 ` c0)∈ ℕ0, (c2 ` c1)∈ ℕ0)
  syl((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin), (c2 ` c0)∈ ℕ0, c0 ∈ Fin)
  biimpar(c0[≅]c1, c1 ∈ Fin, c0 ∈ Fin)
  enfi(c0, c1)
  ffvelrni(c0, cfn, c2, cn0)
  adantl(c0[≅]c1, c1 ∈ Fin, (c2 ` c1)∈ ℕ0)
  ffvelrni(c1, cfn, c2, cn0)
  derangf(s0, s1, s2, c2)
  syl2an((c2 ` c0)∈ ℕ0, (c2 ` c1)∈ ℕ0, ((c2 ` c0)=(c2 ` c1)↔((c2 ` c0)[≤](c2 ` c1)∧(c2 ` c1)[≤](c2 ` c0))), (c2 ` c0)∈ ℝ, (c2 ` c1)∈ ℝ)
  nn0re((c2 ` c0))
  nn0re((c2 ` c1))
  letri3((c2 ` c0), (c2 ` c1))
}

blocks.name: subfacval
blocks.content: The subfactorial is defined as the number of derangements (see ~ derangval ) of the set ` ( 1 ... N ) ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm subfacval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cfz, c0))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, cfn, cfv(chash, cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s3, cn0, cfv(c2, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cfz, c0)))), wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, cfn, cfv(chash, cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2)))))))))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cfz, c0)))), diffss(s0, s1))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cfz, c0)))), diffss(s0, s2))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cfz, c0)))), diffss(s0, s3))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cfz, c0)))), diffss(s1, s2))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cfz, c0)))), diffss(s1, s3))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cfz, c0)))), diffss(s2, s3))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cfz, c0)))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cfz, c0)))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cfz, c0)))), diffsc(s1, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cfz, c0)))), diffsc(s2, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cfz, c0)))), diffsc(s2, c1))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cfz, c0)))), diffsc(s3, c1))
  fvmpt(s3, c0, cn0, c1, cfv(c2, co(nat1, cfz, c0)), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3))))
  fveq2d(c2, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3)), co(nat1, cfz, c0), wceq(cv(s3), c0))
  oveq2(cv(s3), c0, nat1, cfz)
  fvex(c2, co(nat1, cfz, c0))
  diff.cn0.s(s3)
  diff.cfv.s(s3, c2, co(nat1, cfz, c0))
  diff.co.s(s3, nat1, cfz, c0)
  diff.nat1.s(s3)
  diff.cfz.s(s3)
}

blocks.name: derangen2
blocks.content: Write the derangement number in terms of the subfactorial. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm derangen2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(c2, cfv(chash, c0))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cfn, cfv(chash, cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s3, cn0, cfv(c1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
} = {
  eqtr2d(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(c2, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(c1, co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0))), wcel(c0, cfn))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfn), wceq(cfv(c2, cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(c1, co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)))), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0))
  subfacval(s0, s1, s2, s3, cfv(chash, c0), c2, c1)
  mpancom(wcel(c0, cfn), wceq(cfv(c1, co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0))), cfv(c1, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), cen, c0))
  mpbid(wcel(c0, cfn), wbr(co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), cen, c0), wceq(cfv(chash, co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0))), cfv(chash, c0)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfn), wceq(cfv(chash, co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0))), cfv(chash, c0)), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0))
  hashcl(c0)
  hashfz1(cfv(chash, c0))
  mpancom(wcel(c0, cfn), wb(wceq(cfv(chash, co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0))), cfv(chash, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), cen, c0)), wcel(co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), cfn))
  fzfid(nat1, cfv(chash, c0), wcel(c0, cfn))
  hashen(co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0)
  derangen(s0, s1, s2, co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s3, chash, c0)
  diff.chash.s(s3)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0))
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, chash, c0)
  diff.chash.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0))
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.cfz.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, chash, c0)
  diff.chash.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s2, nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0))
  diff.nat1.s(s2)
  diff.cfz.s(s2)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, chash, c0)
  diff.chash.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm derangen2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Fin →(c1 ` c0)=(c2 `(# ` c0)))
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ Fin ↦(# ` { s1 |((s1 : s0 ↔ s0)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ s0,(s1 ` s2)≠ s2))}))
  ⊣ c2 =(s3 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(c1 `(1[...]s3)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c2)
} = {
  eqtr2d((c1 ` c0), (c2 `(# ` c0)), (c1 `(1[...](# ` c0))), c0 ∈ Fin)
  syl(c0 ∈ Fin, (c2 `(# ` c0))=(c1 `(1[...](# ` c0))), (# ` c0)∈ ℕ0)
  subfacval(s0, s1, s2, s3, (# ` c0), c2, c1)
  mpancom(c0 ∈ Fin, (c1 `(1[...](# ` c0)))=(c1 ` c0), (1[...](# ` c0))[≅]c0)
  mpbid(c0 ∈ Fin, (1[...](# ` c0))[≅]c0, (# `(1[...](# ` c0)))=(# ` c0))
  syl(c0 ∈ Fin, (# `(1[...](# ` c0)))=(# ` c0), (# ` c0)∈ ℕ0)
  hashcl(c0)
  hashfz1((# ` c0))
  mpancom(c0 ∈ Fin, ((# `(1[...](# ` c0)))=(# ` c0)↔(1[...](# ` c0))[≅]c0), (1[...](# ` c0))∈ Fin)
  fzfid(nat1, (# ` c0), c0 ∈ Fin)
  hashen((1[...](# ` c0)), c0)
  derangen(s0, s1, s2, (1[...](# ` c0)), c0, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s3, chash, c0)
  diff.chash.s(s3)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, cfz, (# ` c0))
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, chash, c0)
  diff.chash.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat1, cfz, (# ` c0))
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.cfz.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, chash, c0)
  diff.chash.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s2, nat1, cfz, (# ` c0))
  diff.nat1.s(s2)
  diff.cfz.s(s2)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, chash, c0)
  diff.chash.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: subfacf
blocks.content: The subfactorial is a function from nonnegative integers to nonnegative integers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm subfacf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wf(c0, cn0, cn0)
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cfn, cfv(chash, cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s3, cn0, cfv(c1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wf(c0, cn0, cn0), diffss(s0, s3))
  a1ii(wf(c0, cn0, cn0), diffss(s1, s3))
  a1ii(wf(c0, cn0, cn0), diffss(s2, s3))
  a1ii(wf(c0, cn0, cn0), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wf(c0, cn0, cn0), diffsc(s2, c0))
  a1ii(wf(c0, cn0, cn0), diffsc(s3, c0))
  a1ii(wf(c0, cn0, cn0), diffsc(s3, c1))
  mpbi(wf(c0, cn0, cn0), wral(s3, cn0, wcel(cfv(c1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3))), cn0)))
  rgenw(s3, cn0, wcel(cfv(c1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3))), cn0))
  ax-mp(wcel(cfv(c1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3))), cn0), wcel(co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3)), cfn))
  fzfi(nat1, cv(s3))
  ffvelrni(co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3)), cfn, c1, cn0)
  derangf(s0, s1, s2, c1)
  fmpt(s3, cn0, cfv(c1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3))), cn0, c0)
  diff.cn0.s(s3)
}

blocks.name: subfaclefac
blocks.content: The subfactorial is less than the factorial. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm subfaclefac(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wbr(cfv(c1, c0), cle, cfv(cfa, c0)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, cfn, cfv(chash, cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s3, cn0, cfv(c2, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
} = {
  3brtr4d(cfv(c1, c0), cle, cfv(cfa, c0), cfv(chash, cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wral(s2, co(nat1, cfz, c0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2)))))), cfv(chash, cab(s1, wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)))), wcel(c0, cn0))
  mpbird(wcel(c0, cn0), wbr(cfv(chash, cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wral(s2, co(nat1, cfz, c0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2)))))), cle, cfv(chash, cab(s1, wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(nat1, cfz, c0))))), wbr(cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wral(s2, co(nat1, cfz, c0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))), cdom, cab(s1, wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)))))
  mpisyl(wcel(c0, cn0), wbr(cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wral(s2, co(nat1, cfz, c0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))), cdom, cab(s1, wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)))), wcel(cab(s1, wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(nat1, cfz, c0))), cfn), wss(cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wral(s2, co(nat1, cfz, c0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))), cab(s1, wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)))))
  ss2abi(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wral(s2, co(nat1, cfz, c0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2)))), wf1o(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)))

thm subfac0(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cfv(c0, nat0), nat1)
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cfn, cfv(chash, cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s3, cn0, cfv(c1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
} = {
  3eqtri(cfv(c0, nat0), nat1, cfv(c1, co(nat1, cfz, nat0)), cfv(c1, emptycls))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(c0, nat0), cfv(c1, co(nat1, cfz, nat0))), wcel(nat0, cn0))
  0nn0()
  subfacval(s0, s1, s2, s3, nat0, c0, c1)
  fveq2i(c1, co(nat1, cfz, nat0), emptycls)
  fz10()
  derang0(s0, s1, s2, c1)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.nat0.s(s2)
  diff.nat0.s(s3)
}

  ⊢ (c0 ` 0)= 1
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ Fin ↦(# ` { s1 |((s1 : s0 ↔ s0)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ s0,(s1 ` s2)≠ s2))}))
  ⊣ c0 =(s3 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(c1 `(1[...]s3)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)

  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
} = {
  3eqtri((c0 ` 0), nat1, (c1 `(1[...]0)), (c1 ` ∅))
  ax-mp((c0 ` 0)=(c1 `(1[...]0)), 0 ∈ ℕ0)
  0nn0()
  subfacval(s0, s1, s2, s3, nat0, c0, c1)
  fveq2i(c1, (1[...]0), emptycls)
  fz10()
  derang0(s0, s1, s2, c1)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.nat0.s(s2)
  diff.nat0.s(s3)
}

blocks.name: subfacp1lem3
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ subfacp1 . In ~ subfacp1lem6 we cut up the set of all derangements on ` 1 ... ( N + 1 ) ` first according to the value at ` 1 ` , and then by whether or not ` ( f `` ( f `` 1 ) ) = 1 ` . In this lemma, we show that the subset of all ` N + 1 ` derangements that satisfy this for fixed ` M = ( f `` 1 ) ` is in bijection with ` N - 1 ` derangements, by simply dropping the ` x = 1 ` and ` x = M ` points from the function to get a derangement on ` K = ( 1 ... ( N - 1 ) ) \ { 1 , M } ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: subfacp1lem4
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ subfacp1 . The function ` F ` , which swaps ` 1 ` with ` M ` and leaves all other elements alone, is a bijection of order ` 2 ` , i.e. it is its own inverse. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: subfacp1lem5
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ subfacp1 . In ~ subfacp1lem6 we cut up the set of all derangements on ` 1 ... ( N + 1 ) ` first according to the value at ` 1 ` , and then by whether or not ` ( f `` ( f `` 1 ) ) = 1 ` . In this lemma, we show that the subset of all ` N + 1 ` derangements with ` ( f `` ( f `` 1 ) ) =/= 1 ` for fixed ` M = ( f `` 1 ) ` is in bijection with derangements of ` 2 ... ( N + 1 ) ` , because pre-composing with the function ` F ` swaps ` 1 ` and ` M ` and turns the function into a bijection with ` ( f `` 1 ) = 1 ` and ` ( f `` x ) =/= x ` for all other ` x ` , so dropping the point at ` 1 ` yields a derangement on the ` N ` remaining points. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: subfacp1lem6
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ subfacp1 . By induction, we cut up the set of all derangements on ` N + 1 ` according to the ` N ` possible values of ` ( f `` 1 ) ` (since ` ( f `` 1 ) =/= 1 ` ), and for each set for fixed ` M = ( f `` 1 ) ` , the subset of derangements with ` ( f `` M ) = 1 ` has size ` S ( N - 1 ) ` (by ~ subfacp1lem3 ), while the subset with ` ( f `` M ) =/= 1 ` has size ` S ( N ) ` (by ~ subfacp1lem5 ). Adding it all up yields the desired equation ` N ( S ( N ) + S ( N - 1 ) ) ` for the number of derangements on ` N + 1 ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: subfacp1
blocks.content: A two-term recurrence for the subfactorial. This theorem allows us to forget the combinatorial definition of the derangement number in favor of the recursive definition provided by this theorem and ~ subfac0 , ~ subfac1 . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s3, cn0, cfv(c2, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s3)))))

blocks.name: subfaclim
blocks.content: The subfactorial converges rapidly to ` N ! / _e ` . This is part of Metamath 100 proof #88. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: derangfmla
blocks.content: The derangements formula, which expresses the number of derangements of a finite nonempty set in terms of the factorial. The expression ` |_ `` ( x + 1 / 2 ) ` is a way of saying "rounded to the nearest integer". This is part of Metamath 100 proof #88. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm derangfmla(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls)), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(cfl, co(co(cfv(cfa, cfv(chash, c0)), cdiv, ceu), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cfn, cfv(chash, cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wne(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(cfl, co(co(cfv(cfa, cfv(chash, c0)), cdiv, ceu), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn0, cfv(c1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs0)))), cfv(chash, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn0, cfv(c1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs0)))), cfv(chash, c0))))
  derangen2(s0, s1, s2, hs1, c0, c1, cmpt(hs0, cn0, cfv(c1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs0)))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn0, cfv(c1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs0)))), cfv(chash, c0)), cfv(cfl, co(co(cfv(cfa, cfv(chash, c0)), cdiv, ceu), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn))
  biimpar(wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn))
  hashnncl(c0)
  subfacval3(s0, s1, s2, hs1, cfv(chash, c0), cmpt(hs0, cn0, cfv(c1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs0)))), c1)
  cbvmptv(hs0, hs1, cn0, cfv(c1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs0))), cfv(c1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs1))))
  fveq2d(c1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs0)), co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), nat1, cfz)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
